title: Charles-Tim

content: User: cryptoEthSFake pepe airdrop scam. He keeps spamming with it.https://ninjastic.space/topic/5465384https://ninjastic.space/topic/5465385https://ninjastic.space/topic/5465386

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: They have all been deleted and it looks like the link he provides has malware because according to the modlog ---> https://bitcointalk.org/modlog.php one of mods deleted his topics/posts and he did not delete them himself.Thanks for that being done quickly.Bpip did not mention that account has been banned, so I will add more negative trust. https://bpip.org/Profile?p=cryptoEthS

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: This user probably didn't have a good idea about the forum so he was spamming the forum to promote this fake airdrop. There are many members in the forum to exopse these fake promoters like him, resulting in his posts being deleted by the moderators.
